00001 #include "MusimatTutorial.h"
00002 MusimatTutorialSection(B0104) {
00003         Print("*** B.1.4 Constants ***");
00004         /*****************************************************************************
00005          
00006          B.1.4 Constants
00007          
00008          A constant is any number whose value does not change. The number 3 is a constant Integer. The 
00009          number 3.14159 . . . is a constant Real.
00010          
00011          Musimat also predefines two constants, True and False, and gives them integer numeric 
00012          values of 1 and 0, respectively.
00013          
00014          *****************************************************************************/
00015 
00016         Print("True=", True);
00017         Print("False=", False);
00018 
00019 }
00020
